alert.note: Alert for Macon (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued March 26 at 6:14PM CDT until March 27 at 1:00AM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 645 PM CDT FOR WEST CENTRAL LEE...NORTH CENTRAL MACON AND SOUTHEASTERN TALLAPOOSA COUNTIES... At 614 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Liberty City, or near Notasulga, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Tennis ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Notasulga, Liberty City, Southern Lake Martin, Roxana, Reeltown and Yates Reservoir. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 100 AM CDT for southeastern and east central Alabama. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
